
title: "Research Methods in Management - Course Project"
author: "Mkadmi Nabil"


# Preface

This report applies the six core statistical methods covered in the Research Methods in Management course to various datasets:

- **ANOVA**, **Discriminant Analysis**, **PCA**, and **MDS** on the vaccine dataset.
- **Conjoint Analysis** on a designed car-preference survey.
- **PLS-SEM** on the built-in `mobi` dataset.

Each chapter includes data description, assumption checks, analysis code, results, and managerial interpretations.
